directions.text: Cream cheese and butter until light and fluffy.
Add flour, ½ tsp salt and mix well.
Line 24 count mini muffin pan with dough, leaving holes for filling.
Mix sugar, pecans, eggs, 2 TBSP butter, vanilla, cinnamon, and ¼ tsp salt together.
Pour mixture into muffin cups and bake 350Â° for 23½ mins.
